# File test/flex_times_test.rb, line 25
  def test_dt_column
    @model.dt = @text_dt
    assert_equal @model.dt, @text_dt
    
    @model.dt = @hash_dt
    assert @model.dt.is_a?(Time)
    
    @model.dt = @hash_12hr_dt
    assert @model.dt.is_a?(Time)
    assert_equal @model.dt.hour, 0 # adjusts for 12hr time
  end
